scripts.dev: export FRONTEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js frontend) && export BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) && concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch" "npm run frontend:dev"
scripts.dev:windows: cross-env BACKEND_PORT=3002 FRONTEND_PORT=3001 concurrently "npm run backend:dev:watch:windows" "npm run frontend:dev:windows"
scripts.backend:dev:watch:windows: cross-env BACKEND_PORT=3002 npm run cargo -- watch -w backend -x "run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml -- --port 3002"
scripts.build: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build
scripts.build:single: npm run frontend:build && npm run backend:build:single
scripts.backend:dev: BACKEND_PORT=$(node scripts/setup-dev-environment.js backend) npm run backend:dev:watch
scripts.backend:dev:watch: DISABLE_WORKTREE_ORPHAN_CLEANUP=1 npm run cargo -- watch -w backend -x 'run --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml'
scripts.backend:build: npm run cargo -- build --release --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml && npm run cargo -- build --release --bin mcp_task_server --manifest-path backend/Cargo.toml
